email_text:
Subject: Urgent Action Required: Update Your Payment Information

Dear Valued Amazon Customer,

We are writing to inform you that there is an issue with the payment information associated with your Amazon account. In order to avoid any disruption to your services and ensure that your orders are processed smoothly, we kindly ask you to update your credit card details as soon as possible.

Please click on the link below to access your account and update your payment information securely:

[Phishing Link]

Please note that failure to update your payment information within the next 48 hours may result in the suspension of your account. We understand the importance of your shopping experience with us and want to make sure that you can continue to enjoy the convenience of shopping on Amazon without any interruptions.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this request, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team for assistance.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Amazon Customer Service Team
